name: Bipole: Battle Simple!
description:
WARNING: This game is currently in extremely early beta. All enemy sprites are NOT final and gameplay will be heavily tweaked.

Story: You, Advent, have recently been recruited into the royal forces of the country of Castle. However, you start to notice something is off while completing the king's requests and realize the fate of the world may rest in your hands.

Gameplay: Simple, old-school turn-based RPG combat. Use up to four party members at once to defeat your foes! Discover new members of your party and see their different classes.
